name: Museum of Other Realities
detailed_description:
A new space for a new kind of culture. The Museum of Other Realities (MOR) is an immersive art showcase in VR.

A New Frontier for Art


Step into a painting, surround yourself with fantastic sounds, experience art as it evolves and takes form. The museum contains a cross section of the free-ranging experimentation present in the relatively new medium of virtual reality art.

Building a Community


Hang out with friends and enjoy a collective experience with new people. We hold regular events, celebrating and fostering a community around this new medium.

Supporting Artists

Every artist featuring their work in the Museum is paid and promoted.

short_description: An immersive art showcase in VR, the Museum of Other Realities is a space to connect, share, and experience virtual reality art with others.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0 or newer, HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
